DOC.brief_title: Etoposide-Carboplatin Alone With Endostar Extensive Disease Small Cell Lung Cancer ( ED-SCLC )
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : In randomize , open label , placebo-controlled , multicentre trial , 120 patient plan enrolled random 2 arm ( 1:1 ) 10 center June 2009 June 2011 . The leader unit Shanghai Chest Hospital Affiliated Shanghai Jiao-Tong University . Main eligibility criterion histological cytological diagnosis ED-SCLC , age 18-75 year . All eligible patient receive etoposide-carboplatin ( EC ) alone endostar® 4-6 cycle ( 21 day 1 cycle ) . In arm1 patient receive endostar® 7.5mg/m2 day 1 day 14 , etoposide 60 mg/m2 day 1 day 5 carboplatin AUC 5 day 1 . In arm2 patient receive etoposide 60 mg/m2 day 1 day 5 carboplatin AUC 5 day 1 . Primary endpoint : progress free survival ( PFS ) . Secondary endpoint : progress free survival 6 month , overall survival ( OS ) , objective response rate ( ORR ) , clinical benefit rate ( CBR ) , Response duration , time progression ( TTP ) quality life ( QOL ) .
